title: HOPE Scholarship
shortDescription: Florida scholarship for public school students who experienced bullying or violence.
description: The HOPE (Help Our Pupils Excel) Scholarship provides school choice options for Florida public school students who have been subjected to bullying, harassment, battery, kidnapping, assault, or other violent incidents at school. The scholarship allows affected students to transfer to another public school or receive a scholarship to attend an approved private school. For students with autism who may be particularly vulnerable to bullying, this scholarship offers an important safety net.
benefits: Public school transfer option also available
eligibility: Student must be enrolled in a Florida public school and have been subjected to an incident of battery, harassment, bullying, kidnapping, robbery, physical attack, sexual assault, or threat of such acts. The incident must be documented and reported to the school.
howToApply: Report the incident to your public school. Once documented, apply through Step Up For Students for the private school scholarship option, or request a public school transfer through your school district.
